ref_mean_DRAT = 0.026499947000159 * 100.0
ref_mean_DRAT_prime = 0.132499735000795 * 100.0
mean_DRAT, mean_DRAT_prime = lib_ptrm.get_mean_DRAT(self.ref_sum_ptrm_check,
    self.ref_sum_abs_ptrm_check, self.ref_n, self.ref_L)
self.assertAlmostEqual(ref_mean_DRAT, mean_DRAT)
self.assertAlmostEqual(ref_mean_DRAT_prime, mean_DRAT_prime)
